SAVE10" or "CRAVE10"'); } }; const getTotalItems = () => { return cart.reduce((total, item) => total + item.quantity, 0); }; const checkout = () => { if (cart.length === 0) { alert('Your cart is empty!'); return; } const subtotal = getSubtotal(); const discount = getDiscountAmount(); const total = getTotalPrice(); alert(`Checkout complete!\n\nSubtotal: 竄ｱ${subtotal.toFixed(0)}\nDiscount (10%): -竄ｱ${discount.toFixed(0)}\nTotal: 竄ｱ${total.toFixed(0)}\n\nThank you for your order!`); setCart([]); setShowCart(false); }; const openCategoryModal = (category) => { setSelectedCategory(category); setShowCategoryModal(true); }; const closeCategoryModal = () => { setShowCategoryModal(false); setSelectedCategory(null); }; return (
